xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eSOURCE  InvestorsObserver\u003c/p\u003e","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/node/21196611","image":[],"channels":[{"name":"Opinion"},{"name":"Press Releases"}],"stocks":["AAL","AAPL","PFE","TCOM","TGT"],"tags":[{"name":"Banking/Financial Services"}]},"21201772":{"id":21201772,"author":"Business Wire","created":"Wed, 19 May 2021 13:00:00 -0400","updated":"Wed, 19 May 2021 13:00:01 -0400","title":"Apple Previews Powerful Software Updates Designed for People with Disabilities","teaser":"\nNew SignTime service launches Thursday, May 20, to connect Apple Store and Apple Support customers with on-demand sign language interpreters\n\nApple® today announced powerful software features designed for people","body":"\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nNew SignTime service launches Thursday, May 20, to connect Apple Store and Apple Support customers with on-demand sign language interpreters\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nApple\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e today announced powerful software features designed for people with mobility, vision, hearing, and cognitive disabilities. These next-generation technologies showcase Apple's belief that accessibility is a human right and advance the company's long history of delivering industry-leading features that make Apple products customizable for all users.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nLater this year, with software updates across all of Apple's operating systems, people with limb differences will be able to navigate Apple Watch\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e using AssistiveTouch\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e; iPad\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e will support third-party eye-tracking hardware for easier control; and for blind and low vision communities, Apple's industry-leading VoiceOver screen reader will get even smarter using on-device intelligence to explore objects within images. In support of neurodiversity, Apple is introducing new background sounds to help minimize distractions, and for those who are deaf or hard of hearing, Made for iPhone\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e (MFi) will soon support new bi-directional hearing aids.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nApple is also launching a new service on Thursday, May 20, called SignTime. This enables customers to communicate with AppleCare\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e and Retail Customer Care by using American Sign Language (ASL) in the US, British Sign Language (BSL) in the UK, or French Sign Language (LSF) in France, right in their web browsers. Customers visiting Apple Store locations can also use SignTime to remotely access a sign language interpreter without booking ahead of time. SignTime will initially launch in the US, UK, and France, with plans to expand to additional countries in the future. For more information, visit \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink\u0026amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fcontact%2F\u0026amp;esheet=52432387\u0026amp;newsitemid=20210519005726\u0026amp;lan=en-US\u0026amp;anchor=apple.com%2Fcontact\u0026amp;index=1\u0026amp;md5=99ce83ea4e47f888f55d23b9890c393f\" shape=\"rect\"\u003eapple.com/contact\u003c/a\u003e.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\"At Apple, we've long felt that the world's best technology should respond to everyone's needs, and our teams work relentlessly to build accessibility into everything we make,\" said Sarah Herrlinger, Apple's senior director of Global Accessibility Policy and Initiatives. \"With these new features, we're pushing the boundaries of innovation with next-generation technologies that bring the fun and function of Apple technology to even more people — and we can't wait to share them with our users.\"\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAssistiveTouch for Apple Watch\u003c/b\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nTo support users with limited mobility, Apple is introducing a revolutionary new accessibility feature for Apple Watch. AssistiveTouch for watchOS\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e allows users with upper body limb differences to enjoy the benefits of Apple Watch without ever having to touch the display or controls. Using built-in motion sensors like the gyroscope and accelerometer, along with the optical heart rate sensor and on-device machine learning, Apple Watch can detect subtle differences in muscle movement and tendon activity, which lets users navigate a cursor on the display through a series of hand gestures, like a pinch or a clench. AssistiveTouch on Apple Watch enables customers who have limb differences to more easily answer incoming calls, control an onscreen motion pointer, and access Notification Center, Control Center, and more.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eEye-Tracking Support for iPad\u003c/b\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\niPadOS\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e will support third-party eye-tracking devices, making it possible for people to control iPad using just their eyes. Later this year, compatible MFi devices will track where a person is looking onscreen and the pointer will move to follow the person's gaze, while extended eye contact performs an action, like a tap.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eExplore Images with VoiceOver\u003c/b\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nApple is introducing new features for VoiceOver, an industry-leading screen reader for blind and low vision communities. Building on recent updates that brought Image Descriptions to VoiceOver, users can now explore even more details about the people, text, table data, and other objects within images. Users can navigate a photo of a receipt like a table: by row and column, complete with table headers. VoiceOver can also describe a person's position along with other objects within images — so people can relive memories in detail, and with Markup, users can add their own image descriptions to personalize family photos.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eMade for iPhone Hearing Aids and Audiogram Support\u003c/b\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nIn a significant update to the MFi hearing devices program, Apple is adding support for new bi-directional hearing aids. The microphones in these new hearing aids enable those who are deaf or hard of hearing to have hands-free phone and FaceTime\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e conversations. The next-generation models from MFi partners will be available later this year.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nApple is also bringing support for recognizing audiograms — charts that show the results of a hearing test — to Headphone Accommodations. Users can quickly customize their audio with their latest hearing test results imported from a paper or PDF audiogram. Headphone Accommodations amplify soft sounds and adjust certain frequencies to suit a user's hearing.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eBackground Sounds\u003c/b\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nEveryday sounds can be distracting, discomforting, or overwhelming, and in support of neurodiversity, Apple is introducing new background sounds to help minimize distractions and help users focus, stay calm, or rest. Balanced, bright, or dark noise, as well as ocean, rain, or stream sounds continuously play in the background to mask unwanted environmental or external noise, and the sounds mix into or duck under other audio and system sounds.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nAdditional features coming later this year include:\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cul xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"bwlistdisc\"\u003e\n\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eSound Actions for Switch Control \u003c/b\u003ereplaces physical buttons and switches with mouth sounds — such as a click, pop, or \"ee\" sound — for users who are non-speaking and have limited mobility.\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eDisplay and Text Size settings \u003c/b\u003ecan be customized in each app for users with colorblindness or other vision challenges to make the screen easier to see. Users will be able to customize these settings on an app-by-app basis for all supported apps.\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eNew Memoji\u0026#x2122; customizations \u003c/b\u003ebetter represent users with oxygen tubes, cochlear implants, and a soft helmet for headwear.\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nIn celebration of Global Accessibility Awareness Day, Apple is also launching new features, sessions, curated collections, and more:\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cul xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"bwlistdisc\"\u003e\n\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nThis week in \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eApple Fitness+\u003c/b\u003e℠, trainer and award-winning adaptive athlete Amir Ekbatani talks about Apple's commitment to making Fitness+ as accessible and inclusive as possible. Fitness+ features workouts inviting to all, from trainers using sign language in each workout to say \"Welcome\" or \"Great job!,\" to \"Time to Walk\" episodes changing to \"Time to Walk or Push\" for wheelchair workouts on Apple Watch, and all videos include closed captioning. Fitness+ also includes a trainer demonstrating modifications in each workout, so users at all levels can join in.\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eThe Shortcuts for Accessibility Gallery \u003c/b\u003eprovides useful Siri Shortcuts\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e for tracking medications and supporting daily routines, and a new Accessibility Assistant Shortcut helps people discover Apple's built-in features and resources for personalizing them.\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eToday at Apple\u003c/b\u003e\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e \u003c/b\u003eis offering live, virtual sessions in ASL and BSL throughout the day on May 20 that teach the basics of iPhone and iPad for people with disabilities. In some regions, Today at Apple will offer increased availability of Accessibility sessions in stores, through May 30.\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nIn the \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eApp Store\u003c/b\u003e\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e, customers can read stories about Lucy Edwards, an influencer on TikTok who is blind and shares her favorite accessible apps; App of the Day FiLMiC Pro, which is among the most accessible video apps for blind and low vision filmmakers; and more in the new Express Yourself Your Way collection.\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nThe \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eApple TV\u003c/b\u003e\u003csup xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#xAE;\u003c/sup\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e app \u003c/b\u003ewill spotlight its Barrier-Breaking Characters collection which celebrates authentic disability representation onscreen and behind the camera. It features guest curation from creators and artists like the cast of \u0026#34;Best Summer Ever,\" who share their favorite movies and shows in an editorial experience designed by American Pop-Op and Urban Folk artist Tennessee Loveless, known for his vibrant illustrations and colorful storytelling told through the lens of his colorblindness.\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eApple Books\u003c/b\u003e\u0026#x2122;\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e \u003c/b\u003eadds reading recommendations from author and disability rights activist Judith Heumann, along with other themed collections.\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eApple Maps \u003c/b\u003efeatures new guides from Gallaudet University, the world's premier university for Deaf, hard of hearing, and Deafblind students, that help connect users to businesses and organizations that value, embrace, and prioritize the Deaf community and signed languages.\n\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nApple revolutionized personal technology with the introduction of the Macintosh in 1984. Today, Apple leads the world in innovation with iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, and Apple TV. Apple's five software platforms — iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS — provide seamless experiences across all Apple devices and empower people with breakthrough services including the App Store, Apple Music, Apple Pay, and iCloud. Apple's more than 100,000 employees are dedicated to making the best products on earth, and to leaving the world better than we found it.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nNOTE TO EDITORS: For additional information visit Apple Newsroom (\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink\u0026amp;url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fnewsroom\u0026amp;esheet=52432387\u0026amp;newsitemid=20210519005726\u0026amp;lan=en-US\u0026amp;anchor=www.apple.com%2Fnewsroom\u0026amp;index=2\u0026amp;md5=6414299bb614c1a182b1ff95d382a6e5\" shape=\"rect\"\u003ewww.apple.com/newsroom\u003c/a\u003e), or call Apple's Media Helpline at (408) 974-2042.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u0026#xA9; 2021 Apple Inc. xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eSOURCE  InvestorsObserver\u003c/p\u003e","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/node/21258117","image":[],"channels":[{"name":"Opinion"},{"name":"Press Releases"}],"stocks":["AAPL","COIN","JNJ","NVDA","PFE"],"tags":[{"name":"Banking/Financial Services"}]},"21275660":{"id":21275660,"author":"PRNewswire","created":"Tue, 25 May 2021 08:30:00 -0400","updated":"Tue, 25 May 2021 08:30:11 -0400","title":"NFTs Flipping the Script, Bringing Value Back to Music Artists","teaser":"NEW YORK, May 25, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- With the onset of the digital universe over the last decades, music has been steadily devalued with a race to the bottom pricing to give subscribers access to massive databases of","body":"\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eNEW YORK\u003c/span\u003e, \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-chron\"\u003eMay 25, 2021\u003c/span\u003e /PRNewswire/ -- With the onset of the digital universe over the last decades, music has been steadily devalued with a race to the bottom pricing to give subscribers access to massive databases of music. Pandemic social shutdowns were another blow to musicians, who now couldn\u0026#39;t even generate revenue from live performances. In recent months, the emergence of NFTs, or non-fungible tokens, are breathing life into the industry as musicians are getting creative with ways to generate revenue and better connect with fans. An NFT is, in essence, a collectible digital asset, which holds value as a form of cryptocurrency and as a form of art or culture, and offers artists the ability to monetize their art or music. Music DeFi pioneer \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eBAND Royalty \u003c/b\u003e(\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.investorbrandnetwork.com/clients/band-royalty/\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eProfile\u003c/a\u003e) is taking NFTs to the next level by structuring them with the opportunity to access royalties from its constantly growing library of soundtracks. Just as \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eApple Inc.\u003c/b\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AAPL#NASDAQ\"\u003eAAPL\u003c/a\u003e) and \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAmazon\u003c/b\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AMZN#NASDAQ\"\u003eAMZN\u003c/a\u003e) shook up the music industry with their subscription services and exclusive content, NFTs are being hailed as the next great disruptor, which would likely benefit \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eRiot Blockchain Inc\u003c/b\u003e. (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/RIOT#NASDAQ\"\u003eRIOT\u003c/a\u003e), \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eCoinbase Global Inc\u003c/b\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/COIN#NASDAQ\"\u003eCOIN\u003c/a\u003e) and others already deep in the cryptocurrency and blockchain markets.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" type=\"disc\"\u003e\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eSales of NFTs soared to more than \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$2 billion\u003c/span\u003e in Q1 2021, up from \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$93 million\u003c/span\u003e in Q4 2020.\u003c/b\u003e \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eBAND Royalty is creating a revolutionary ecosystem that provides investors the opportunity to participate in the music royalty market.\u003c/b\u003e \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eBAND Royalty \u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003ehas amassed an impressive library of rights to royalties for tracks from some of the music world\u0026#39;s most popular artists. \u003c/b\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eOnce BAND\u0026#39;s NFT is staked, NFT holders\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e can access music royalties in four different ways.\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eClick \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.nnw.fm/559EV\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003ehere\u003c/a\u003e to view the custom infographic of the \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eBAND Royalty \u003c/b\u003eeditorial.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eNFTs Are Pure Gold for Artists\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eNFTs, one-of-a-kind assets stored and verified on immutable blockchain technology \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.nnw.fm/IPZqS\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eexploded on the scene in 2021,\u003c/a\u003e headlined by Christie\u0026#39;s auctioning a collection of Beeple\u0026#39;s digital artwork for \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$69.3 million\u003c/span\u003e in March. During the first quarter of 2021, NFT sales exceeded \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$2 billion\u003c/span\u003e, up more than 20-fold from \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$93 million\u003c/span\u003e in Q4 2020. The \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$2\u003c/span\u003e-plus billion wasn\u0026#39;t inflated by the Beeple auction, according to nonfungible.com. Also excluded were sales of NBA Top Shots, video highlights converted into NFTs. NBA Top Shot trade on the Flow platform reached \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$472 million\u003c/span\u003e during Q1 2021.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eLike Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, NFTs can be held, sold or traded. Working as part of the complex encryption network of the Ethereum blockchain, NFTs are protected from counterfeiting as all transactions are on the blockchain, open to the public for tracing and authentication. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eTo date, the collectible space has been the primary attention draw, but the breadth of the market is starting to push through, including the music industry joining the mix. On \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-chron\"\u003eMarch 12\u003c/span\u003e, Music Business Worldwide reported that NFTs \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.nnw.fm/EKY5E\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003egrossed \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$35 million\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e for the music industry in the past month, including Linkin Park\u0026#39;s \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eMike Shinoda\u003c/span\u003e making more than \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$30,000\u003c/span\u003e with his new single \u0026#34;Happy Endings\u0026#34; and \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eKings\u003c/span\u003e of \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eLeon\u003c/span\u003e becoming the first brand name band to release a new album as an NFT on the blockchain platform YellowHeart. YouTuber and musician PelleK in February claimed to be the first ever to release an NFT music album, which sold out in less than two hours when presales opened, generating \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$160,000\u003c/span\u003e. BAND Royalty did a \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.nnw.fm/opYsR\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003elimited private sale\u003c/a\u003e of its music NFTs, selling its three top NFTs for more than \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$200,000\u003c/span\u003e and resulting in combined NFT presales of more than \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$700,000\u003c/span\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eIn the midst of this frenzy, \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.investorbrandnetwork.com/clients/band-royalty/\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eBAND Royalty\u003c/a\u003e is establishing a new NFT paradigm. The company is democratizing music royalties by creating new opportunities to participate in a valuable asset class that\u0026#39;s now gained stability after years of decline with the advent of music streaming. The company has already amassed an impressive library of rights to royalties for tracks from popular artists such as \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eJustin Timberlake\u003c/span\u003e, Beyonce, Jay-Z, Cher, Rihanna, \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eDemi Lovato\u003c/span\u003e, Timbaland, \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eMissy Elliott\u003c/span\u003e and more. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eThere is also a unique collection component to owning a BAND NFT. The company has commissioned leading artists to create distinctive, 3D artwork for each of the strictly limited-edition BAND NFTs. With musician-facing foresight, BAND intends to dedicate part of its platform to serve as a launchpad for new talent.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eThe BA \u0026amp; ND of BAND\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#34;BAND\u0026#34; is more than just a memorable industry moniker. It also comes from the company\u0026#39;s founders, Barnaby Andersun (BA) + Noble Drakoln (ND), two key opinion leaders in blockchain. Andersun is also CEO of BlockAlchemy, a blockchain, ecommerce and digital design consulting firm, and a widely sought-after public speaker on blockchain, including speaking at the World Economic Forum in \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eDavos\u003c/span\u003e and \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-org\"\u003eHarvard University\u003c/span\u003e on the subject.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eIn addition to being a best-selling author and contributor to mainstream media outlets such as Forbes, Fox Business News and Bloomberg, Drakoln, CEO of AR/XR game designer WarePlay Games Inc., brings decades of experience to BAND as an avid music royalty investor. The knowledge and networking into the inner sanctum of the royalty business is a clear differentiator for BAND.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eDon\u0026#39;t \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eJust Listen\u003c/span\u003e to the Music, Make Money From It\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eCurrently retail investors can only get exposure to the music industry by buying stock in a public music label, investing in funds that buy/sell music royalties, or via websites that auction royalty rights, often well into the six-figure dollar range. In what many perceive as a ground-floor opportunity, BAND Royalty is changing the landscape and making it accessible for retail investors to participate by owning NFTs.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAfter a private sale of music NFTs that \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.nnw.fm/CMMfq\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003egenerated almost \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$1 million\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e, BAND launched its own NFT sales platform on its website, creating the first music NFT-only platform this month. The company opened up access to the first series of 3,000 BAND NFTs on its platform, staggering the release based on rarity. The company\u0026#39;s plan is to keep the NFT count tight, much like other popular NFT projects such as CryptoPunks and Hashmasks, both of which have had \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.nnw.fm/VqA5Y\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003esecondary market sales\u003c/a\u003e in the millions of dollars. The long-term intention is to have a maximum of 12,000 BAND NFTs across four different series to be released over the next 18 months. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eOnce someone purchases a BAND NFT, they can hold or trade it like any other cryptocurrency, or once they pass the BAND KYC protocols, they will be able to \u0026#34;stake\u0026#34; their NFT for a chance to participate in the revenues from one of three music royalty pools: print music royalties, mechanical and public performance royalties, or synchronization royalties, most likely with their share being paid out in the upcoming BAND token. Staking can be for different time periods ranging from 90 days up to 5 years.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eJust the Beginning: Upcoming Catalysts\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAs \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.nnw.fm/pDkm7\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eexplained by Andersun\u003c/a\u003e on \u0026#34;The Nifty Show\u0026#34; podcast, the vision of the company is starting to be realized. The first series of NFTs were launched this month as the team works to complete the smart contracts that undergird the staking mechanism. Those are expected to be completed this quarter, which sets the royalty revenue component in motion. The goal is to allow BAND NFT stakers the ability to share in four different streams of income, including 50% from all BAND royalty music catalog revenue, a percentage from any auctions of single BAND music tracks sold, 5% on any BAND NFTs traded in the secondary market on OpenSea (or the BAND platform), and 5% from re-selling of music royalties on the BAND platform.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eThe playbook is for a comprehensive music royalty ecosystem, complete with a launchpad for emerging artists. Presently, musicians are at the mercy of the record industry, a dynamic that BAND intends to disrupt with a platform that gives artists more opportunity to earn and keep royalties with added perks to connect with their fan base through exclusive offers.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eUpending the Norm\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eThe music industry has faced bona fide headwinds for decades, as the internet and streaming music became the death knell for terrestrial radio. But where technology taketh away, technology giveth back in the form of blockchain and NFTs, which will likely capture all the top players spanning the entire breadth of music, crypto and blockchain domains looking for new methods of monetization to enhance revenue streams.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eApple Inc. \u003c/b\u003e(NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AAPL#NASDAQ\"\u003eAAPL\u003c/a\u003e) has been quiet as to how many Apple Music subscribers it has since passing 60 million in \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-chron\"\u003eJune 2019\u003c/span\u003e, but \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.nnw.fm/YKHNp\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eCFO \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eLuca Maestri\u003c/span\u003e did say\u003c/a\u003e last month that Apple had more than 660 million paid subscriptions across all its services as of Q1 2021. The tech juggernaut still hasn\u0026#39;t made any moves into cryptocurrency or NFTs yet, although their SVP of Internet Software and Services, \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eEddy Cue\u003c/span\u003e, last month joined the advisory board of Autograph, an upstart NFT company founded by NFL legend \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eTom Brady\u003c/span\u003e that is being stacked with tech heavyweights, including \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eDawn Ostroff\u003c/span\u003e, the CCO of Apple rival Spotify.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAmazon \u003c/b\u003e(NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AMZN#NASDAQ\"\u003eAMZN\u003c/a\u003e) isn\u0026#39;t peddling NFTs on its massive ecommerce platform, but the company certainly has established a standard for innovating the music industry. Last year the company \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.nnw.fm/D5P5o\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003ereported its streaming service\u003c/a\u003e had reached more than 55 million customers globally, with subscriptions to Amazon Music Unlimited growing by more than 50% compared to the year before. In addition, the service saw incredible growth around the world: Amazon Music grew nearly 50% year-over-year across \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003ethe United States\u003c/span\u003e, the \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eUnited Kingdom\u003c/span\u003e, \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eGermany\u003c/span\u003e and \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eJapan\u003c/span\u003e while more than doubling in newer countries such as \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eFrance\u003c/span\u003e, \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eItaly\u003c/span\u003e, \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eSpain\u003c/span\u003e, and \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eMexico\u003c/span\u003e. The company also introduced Amazon Music HD, which brings music fans the highest-quality audio available for streaming.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eRiot Blockchain Inc\u003c/b\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/RIOT#NASDAQ\"\u003eRIOT\u003c/a\u003e) made its biggest move to date to establish itself as the leader in mining of Bitcoin, the popular cryptocurrency where data is stored on blockchain technology. Riot in April agreed to by \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$651 million\u003c/span\u003e in cash and stock to acquire all the assets and operations of Whinstone US, Inc. Once the transaction is complete, Riot will own the largest Bitcoin mining facility in \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eNorth America\u003c/span\u003e, with very low power costs, a key to efficient cryptocurrency mining.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eCoinbase Global Inc \u003c/b\u003e(NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/COIN#NASDAQ\"\u003eCOIN\u003c/a\u003e) was the first cryptocurrency exchange to go public, making its debut on \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-chron\"\u003eApril 14\u003c/span\u003e via a direct listing that NASDAQ said valued shares at \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$250\u003c/span\u003e each. COIN stock shot ahead to as high as \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$429\u003c/span\u003e in intraday trading before closing at \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$328.28\u003c/span\u003e, valuing the company at \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$85.8 billion\u003c/span\u003e. Interestingly, Coinbase CFO \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eAlesia Haas\u003c/span\u003e said that the company is considering NFTs to diversify its revenue streams from trading fees, although she stopped short of providing details about any upcoming strategy (\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.nnw.fm/3NiFf\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003ehttps://www.nnw.fm/3NiFf\u003c/a\u003e).\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eDigital content continues accelerating, underscored by Millennials and Gen Zers valuing digital goods every bit as much as tangible goods they can hold in their hands. NFTs have already established a toehold in the new digital universe and BAND\u0026#39;s NFTs look to claim even more turf. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eFor more information about BAND Royalty, please visit\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.investorbrandnetwork.com/clients/dgtl-holdings-inc/\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003e \u003c/a\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.investorbrandnetwork.com/clients/band-royalty/\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eBAND Royalty\u003c/a\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e.\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAbout NetworkNewsWire\u003c/b\u003e \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cu xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eNetworkNewsWire\u003c/u\u003e (\u0026#34;NNW\u0026#34;) is a financial news and content distribution company, one of 50+ brands within the \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.investorbrandnetwork.com/\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eInvestorBrandNetwork\u003c/a\u003e (\u0026#34;IBN\u0026#34;), that provides: (1) access to a network of wire solutions via \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.networkwire.com/\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eNetworkWire\u003c/a\u003e to reach all target markets, industries and demographics in the most effective manner possible; (2) article and editorial syndication to 5,000+ news outlets; (3) enhanced press release solutions to ensure maximum impact; (4) social media distribution via IBN millions of social media followers; and (5) a full array of corporate communications solutions. xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eBAC: \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://c212.net/c/link/?t=0\u0026amp;l=en\u0026amp;o=3175137-2\u0026amp;h=484786576\u0026amp;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investorsobserver.com%2Flp%2Fpr-options-lp-2%2F%3Fstocksymbol%3DBAC%26prnumber%3D052520216\u0026amp;a=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investorsobserver.com%2Flp%2Fpr-options-lp-2%2F%3Fstocksymbol%3DBAC%26prnumber%3D052520216\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cdiv xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"PRN_ImbeddedAssetReference\" id=\"DivAssetPlaceHolder2\"\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" id=\"PURL\"\u003e\u003cimg xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" title=\"Cision\" width=\"12\" height=\"12\" alt=\"Cision\" src=\"https://c212.net/c/img/favicon.png?sn=CG89490\u0026amp;sd=2021-05-25\"\u003e\u003c/img\u003e View original content to download multimedia:\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" id=\"PRNURL\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/thinking-about-trading-options-or-stock-in-apple-nio-ford-virgin-galactic-or-bank-of-america-301298955.html\"\u003ehttp://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/thinking-about-trading-options-or-stock-in-apple-nio-ford-virgin-galactic-or-bank-of-america-301298955.html\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eSOURCE  InvestorsObserver\u003c/p\u003e","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/node/21280488","image":[],"channels":[{"name":"Opinion"},{"name":"Press Releases"}],"stocks":["AAPL","BAC","F","NIO","SPCE"],"tags":[{"name":"Banking/Financial Services"}]},"21292244":{"id":21292244,"author":"Business Wire","created":"Wed, 26 May 2021 05:00:00 -0400","updated":"Wed, 26 May 2021 05:00:01 -0400","title":"Apple Via del Corso Opens Thursday, May 27, in Rome","teaser":"\nNew central location in the heart of Rome will welcome customers to the historic Palazzo Marignoli\n\nApple® today previewed Apple Via del Corso, the newest retail location nestled in one of Rome\u0026#39;s most vibrant","body":"\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nNew central location in the heart of Rome will welcome customers to the historic Palazzo Marignoli\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nApple\u0026#xAE; today previewed Apple Via del Corso, the newest retail location nestled in one of Rome's most vibrant areas. As the 17th store to open in Italy, Apple Via del Corso will serve as an all-new, centrally located space for Apple team members to provide best-in-class service and support to the local community. The store preserves the grand Palazzo Marignoli, paying homage to Rome's rich history of art and culture, and making it one of Apple's most significant restoration projects.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nApple Via del Corso also brings the first-ever Today at Apple\u0026#xAE; Made in Rome program dedicated to providing the next generation of young Romans with inspiration, skills, and tools to explore their passions. Led by over 40 local artists, Apple curated sessions across the fields of music, art and design, content creation, and video, aimed at supporting local communities across the city in the months to come. Once in-person sessions return, the new store will also host free Today at Apple sessions on topics ranging from photography and video, music, coding, art, design, and more.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\"We can't wait to begin a new chapter in Rome with the opening of Apple Via del Corso,\" said Deirdre O'Brien, Apple's senior vice president of Retail + People. \"The new store represents a celebration of the unique history and art of Roman culture, and we hope to inspire creativity among the local community with our Made in Rome program and future Today at Apple sessions.\"\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nOriginally constructed in 1873 by renowned architect Salvatore Bianchi and a second renovation by architect Giulio Podesti, Palazzo Marignoli was the home of Marquis Filippo Marignoli and housed Caffè Aragno, one of Rome's most notable gathering places in its day frequented by artists, writers, and actors. Several pieces of art showcased in Caffè Aragno have been carefully restored and thoughtfully incorporated within the new store design, including multiple graffiti panels created by Italian painter Afro Basaldella in 1950. The teams were also able to revive and integrate Fabio Cipolla's \"Dawn\" and Ettore Ballerini's \"Dusk,\" two large ceiling paintings that date back to the early 1900s. Similar to previous restorations such as Apple Champs-Élysées in Paris, Regent Street in London, and Carnegie Library in Washington, D.C., Apple and a team of local restorers collaborated to create a thoughtful combination of historic and contemporary architecture with Via del Corso.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nLarge glass windows face Via del Corso, allowing natural light to stream into the interior. The store centers around a lush courtyard brimming with native Camphora trees — the green heart of the palazzo and a remnant of the historic monastery Santa Maria Maddalena delle Convertite. On the first floor, four sets of doors provide access to an exterior landscaped terrace filled with jasmine vines and olive trees inspired by Roman roof terraces that look into the courtyard. Once inside, visitors will find a monumental staircase dating back to 1888, restored to its original detailing of locally sourced Carrara marble. On the upper floor, the Forum occupies the ballroom of the Marquis's palazzo, which will be home to Today at Apple sessions. Adjacent to the Forum is a dedicated space for Apple Support and the Genius Bar\u0026#xAE;, where a team of conservators have worked thousands of hours to restore the exquisite, geometrically patterned, hand-painted ceiling.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nVia del Corso joins the 117 Apple Store\u0026#xAE; locations across 12 countries in Europe. Apple's presence in Europe spans more than 40 years, supporting over 1.8 million jobs with more than 100 new jobs created at the new store. In all, Via del Corso is home to 200 team members who collectively speak 20 languages.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nOn opening day, customers wishing to visit Apple Via del Corso are encouraged to book an appointment at \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink\u0026amp;url=http%3A%2F%2Fapple.com%2Fit%2Fviadelcorso\u0026amp;esheet=52435640\u0026amp;newsitemid=20210526005363\u0026amp;lan=en-US\u0026amp;anchor=apple.com%2Fit%2Fviadelcorso\u0026amp;index=1\u0026amp;md5=1a7411ac296fc177f659a5f81b6f2a67\" shape=\"rect\"\u003eapple.com/it/viadelcorso\u003c/a\u003e. Customers without reservations will be welcome based on store occupancy. The store will open with the same comprehensive health and safety procedures currently in place across all Apple Store locations. For those wishing to order new products online, customers can get shopping help from Apple Specialists, choose monthly financing options, trade in eligible devices, receive Support services, and select no-contact delivery or Apple Store pickup for online purchases.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nApple Via del Corso opens Thursday, May 27, at 10 a.m. CEST in Rome.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nApple revolutionized personal technology with the introduction of the Macintosh in 1984. Today, Apple leads the world in innovation with iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, and Apple TV. Apple's five software platforms — iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS — provide seamless experiences across all Apple devices and empower people with breakthrough services including the App Store, Apple Music, Apple Pay, and iCloud. Apple's more than 100,000 employees are dedicated to making the best products on earth, and to leaving the world better than we found it.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\nNOTE TO EDITORS: For additional information visit Apple Newsroom (\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink\u0026amp;url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fnewsroom\u0026amp;esheet=52435640\u0026amp;newsitemid=20210526005363\u0026amp;lan=en-US\u0026amp;anchor=www.apple.com%2Fnewsroom\u0026amp;index=2\u0026amp;md5=6eb41139e426a5fd8f84ab6848cc7bee\" shape=\"rect\"\u003ewww.apple.com/newsroom\u003c/a\u003e), or call Apple's Media Helpline at (408) 974-2042.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n\u0026#xA9; 2021 Apple Inc. All rights reserved. Apple, Today at Apple, Genius Bar, Apple Store, and the Apple logo are trademarks of Apple. Other company and product names may be trademarks of their respective owners.\n\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cimg xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" 2021\u003c/span\u003e, Moomoo Inc., an indirect, wholly-owned subsidiary of Futu Holdings Limited (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/FUTU#NASDAQ\"\u003eFUTU\u003c/a\u003e) announced the launch of its new customer referral program, \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cu xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://eyum.app.link/3ZrFdx1lxgb\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eMoomoo Ambassador\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/u\u003e\u003c/b\u003e, for its stock investment platform, \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cu xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://eyum.app.link/fSeO3TDyxgb\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003emoomoo\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/u\u003e\u003c/b\u003e. Moomoo Ambassador further boosts the inclusivity and connectivity within the moomoo investing community. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n    \u003cdiv xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"PRN_ImbeddedAssetReference\" id=\"DivAssetPlaceHolder1\"\u003e\n                \u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\n                        \u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" href=\"https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/1524280/image1.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003e\n                    \u003cimg xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" src=\"https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/1524280/image1.jpg\" title=\"The Moomoo Trading App Launches New Referral Program - Moomoo Ambassador\" alt=\"The Moomoo Trading App Launches New Referral Program - Moomoo Ambassador\"\u003e\u003c/img\u003e\n                        \u003c/a\u003e\n                \u003c/p\u003e\n\n    \u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eIn line with the company\u0026#39;s mission to \u0026#34;make investing easier and not alone,\u0026#34; every moomoo user can become a Moomoo Ambassador by referring one or more new moomoo customers. With this new program, both the referrer, aka the Moomoo Ambassador, and their referee will receive free stocks from moomoo, with each share of stock valued between \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$8\u003c/span\u003e-\u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$1,000\u003c/span\u003e, based on a lucky-draw mechanism. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAdditionally, Moomoo Ambassadors can level up and receive more rewards for each successful referral. Under the current Moomoo Ambassador program, a Level 3 Moomoo Ambassador can earn up to three free stocks for each successful referral, valued between \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$24\u003c/span\u003e - \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$3,000 USD\u003c/span\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAs a debut bonus, from \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-chron\"\u003eJune 1st to July 1st, 2021\u003c/span\u003e, all Moomoo Ambassadors have a chance to earn a guaranteed share of Apple Stock (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AAPL#NASDAQ\"\u003eAAPL\u003c/a\u003e). When a Moomoo Ambassador successfully invites two new moomoo customers who have made qualified deposits, the Moomoo Ambassador is eligible to receive one share of Apple (AAPL) stock, guaranteed. This reward is stackable on top of the regular Moomoo Ambassador rewards, where Ambassadors with their first successful referral will earn one free share of stock, with 2nd -10th referrals earn 2 shares of free stocks, and with 11th or more referrals\u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" id=\"spanHghlt1b32\"\u003e, \u003c/span\u003eearn 3 shares of free stocks, each valued at \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$8\u003c/span\u003e-\u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$1,000\u003c/span\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eU.S. residents with a valid Social Security Number (SSN)\u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" id=\"spanHghlta5db\"\u003e,\u003c/span\u003e who are 18+ years old can become a Moomoo Ambassador by downloading the moomoo app, registering an account with Futu Inc and inviting new users. Once in the app, moomoo users can find the Moomoo Ambassador program by visiting \u0026#34;Free Stocks\u0026#39;\u0026#39; under the \u0026#34;Me\u0026#34; tab. When outside of the moomoo app, moomoo users can visit the \u003cu xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://eyum.app.link/3ZrFdx1lxgb\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eMoomoo Ambassador page\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/u\u003e and click on the \u0026#34;Invite Friends\u0026#34; button to get a personalized invitation link, which can be posted to one-on-one messaging apps, such as WhatsApp, iMessage, SMS messaging, Line, or social media sites, such as Twitter, Facebook, reddit, LinkedIn, Snapchat, Youtube or TikTok, etc. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eMoomoo is one of the fastest-growing investor communities in the world, with more than 14 million users, according to Futu\u0026#39;s Q1 Financials posted on \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-chron\"\u003eMay 19th, 2021\u003c/span\u003e. \u0026#34;Since the inception of Futu in 2012, we have been committed to improving the investing experience of our users, dedicating over 70% of our employees to research and development. We also believe that investing should not be a difficult and lonesome process and have placed great emphasis on social elements to connect traders through the moomoo community and give moomoo users, who are mostly retail investors, access to previously unattainable publicly listed companies in the moomoo app,\u0026#34; says Leaf Li, Founder \u0026amp; CEO of Futu.  \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eRecognizing the importance of having both user-friendly design and advanced product features, Futu Holdings Limited designed moomoo with a sleek user interface, zero-commission trading of equities in several stock exchanges across the globe, including US, \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eHong Kong\u003c/span\u003e, \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eSingapore\u003c/span\u003e, and China A Shares. The moomoo app also includes the latest technologies, such as AI-driven stock screeners and advanced stock trading charts, facilitating the convenience of trading across multiple markets with its multi-currency capability. Futu Holdings Limited reported a 368% year-over-year revenue growth, based on its Q1 2021 financial reports. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#34;We believe that our Moomoo Ambassador program will not only reward users for sharing but also demonstrate that we put our money where our mouth is to \u0026#39;make investing easier and not alone.\u0026#39; If you love moomoo, tell your friends about it. If you have suggestions for how moomoo can improve, let us know. I check comments in the moomoo community all the time.\u0026#34; continued Li.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eTerms and conditions apply. Details about the Moomoo Ambassador program can be found on the \u003cu xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://eyum.app.link/3ZrFdx1lxgb\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eMoomoo Ambassador Program\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/u\u003e page. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAbout moomoo\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eHeadquartered in \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003ePalo Alto, California\u003c/span\u003e, Moomoo Inc. is an indirect, wholly-owned subsidiary of Futu Holdings Ltd (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/FUTU#NASDAQ\"\u003eFUTU\u003c/a\u003e), with its mission to transform personal investing experience with an intuitive user interface, fully digitized brokerage and trading platform. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAbout Futu Inc.\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eA brokerage firm registered with the SEC (CRD#: 283078/SEC: 8-69739); a member in good standing of Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA) and the SIPC; Futu Inc. is regulated by the SEC and FINRA. It is an indirect, wholly-owned subsidiary of Futu Holdings Ltd.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAbout Futu Holdings Limited\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eFutu Holdings Limited (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/FUTU#NASDAQ\"\u003eFUTU\u003c/a\u003e) is an advanced technology company transforming the investing experience by offering a fully digitized brokerage and wealth management platform. Pursuing a massive opportunity to facilitate a once-in-a-generation shift in the wealth management industry and build a digital gateway into broader financial services. The organization\u0026#39;s primary fee-generating services include trade execution and margin financing which allow its clients to trade securities, such as stocks, warrants, options, futures, and exchange-traded funds, or ETFs, across different markets. Futu enhances the user and client experience with market data and news, research, as well as powerful analytical tools, providing them with a data-rich foundation to simplify the investing decision-making process. Futu has also embedded social media tools to create a network centered around its users and provide connectivity to users, investors, companies, analysts, media and key opinion leaders.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cdiv xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"PRN_ImbeddedAssetReference\" id=\"DivAssetPlaceHolder2\"\u003e\n                \u003cp More importantly, it could be the only fuel on earth that produces zero emissions when burned.  Mentioned in today\u0026#39;s commentary includes:  \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eBallard Power Systems Inc.\u003c/b\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/BLDP#NASDAQ\"\u003eBLDP\u003c/a\u003e), \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAmazon.com, Inc.\u003c/b\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AMZN#NASDAQ\"\u003eAMZN\u003c/a\u003e), \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eMicrosoft Corporation\u003c/b\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/MSFT#NASDAQ\"\u003eMSFT\u003c/a\u003e), \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eApple Inc.\u003c/b\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AAPL#NASDAQ\"\u003eAAPL\u003c/a\u003e), \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eHP Inc.\u003c/b\u003e (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/HPQ#NYSE\"\u003eHPQ\u003c/a\u003e).\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eUntil recently, this remarkable fuel was considered too dangerous and expensive to be used commercially…But a new technological breakthrough appears to have made the adoption of this super fuel much more likely. But getting your hands on the technology that makes this all possible… well we think that is no easy task.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eThroughout the history of the energy industry, new--more powerful--sources of energy have started off small … and then come to dominate the industry for a time.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eFrom coal ... to petroleum ... to natural gas... And now, renewables. Each new energy source had a scientific problem to overcome before widespread adoption.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eCould This Be The Death Of Lithium?\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eFor decades, lithium had been thought to be the solution to the clean energy movement. Unfortunately, it has been proven that lithium will not be able to provide enough power for long-range trucks... ocean-going freighters... military vehicles...trains… planes... jets, and more.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eWhy? The story of energy transitions through history has been a constant move toward fuels that are more energy-dense and convenient to use than the fuels they replaced. It simply doesn\u0026#39;t appear to have enough power density to become practical for \u003ci xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eHEAVY\u003c/i\u003e industries. But now finally... scientists may be able to harness a NEW renewable replacement that CAN easily power heavy industry.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eSo, what has nearly 3X more energy than gasoline? And is a widely used inorganic chemical? Hydrogen. But, until now, the technology didn\u0026#39;t exist to transport it safely and economically. That\u0026#39;s where \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAmmPower Corp.\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e (\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AMMP.CN\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eAMMP\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e; \u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AMMPF\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003e AMMPF\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e)\u003c/b\u003e comes in...\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eA New \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$81 Billion\u003c/span\u003e Opportunity \u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAfter decades of stagnation and multiple false dawns, we think the hydrogen economy now appears primed for a major takeoff. Entire countries and industries are proactively investing in the development of hydrogen technologies.  Hydrogen is now being dubbed by some as a \u0026#39;fuel of the future.\u0026#39; \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eBank of America says hydrogen technology is at a tipping point and could be set to explode with a total market potential reaching \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$11 trillion\u003c/span\u003e by 2050. And last year, the European Union set out its new hydrogen strategy… and now, the private sector may be looking to give the EU a run for its money.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eSome of the world\u0026#39;s green hydrogen leaders have joined hands with an ambitious goal to drive a 50-fold scale-up in green hydrogen production over the next six years.The \u003cu xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://racetozero.unfccc.int/green-hydrogen-catapult/\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eGreen Hydrogen Catapult Initiative\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/u\u003e is another huge endeavor founded by Saudi clean energy group ACWA Power, Australian project developer CWP Renewables, European energy giants Iberdrola and Ørsted, Chinese wind turbine manufacturer Envision, Italian gas group Snam, and Yara, a Norwegian fertilizer producer.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eThey aim to drive 25GW of green – easily transportable -- hydrogen production by 2026. That transportation breakthrough could push hydrogen costs below \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$2\u003c/span\u003e/kg, making it competitive with fossil fuels.\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eThe Ammonia Revolution\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eLiquid ammonia, which is made up of one nitrogen atom and three hydrogen atoms, has a volumetric hydrogen density about 45% \u003ci xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003ehigher\u003c/i\u003e than that of liquid hydrogen. It also has the advantage of being easy and safe to store. It is ammonia, and the remarkable technological breakthroughs being made by companies like \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAmmPower \u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e(\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AMMP.CN\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eAMMP\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e; \u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AMMPF\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003e AMMPF\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e)\u003c/b\u003e, that may hold the key to the hydrogen revolution.\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AMMP.CN\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eAmmPower\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e \u003c/b\u003ealong with a handful of smaller organizations such as \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eIceland\u003c/span\u003e-based \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAtmonia\u003c/b\u003e and \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eColorado\u003c/span\u003e-based \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eStarfire Energy\u003c/b\u003e, may have a clear first-mover advantage as the only companies on the planet developing innovative ways to revolutionize the entire ammonia production process and produce carbon-free ammonia.\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003eThe company aims to spearhead catalytic research for optimal ammonia production as well as develop stable and reliable production processes. \u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eDiversification is Everything \u003c/b\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAmmPower Corp.\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e (\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AMMP.CN\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eAMMP\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e; \u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AMMPF\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003e AMMPF\u003c/a\u003e) \u003c/b\u003esays it is building modular, scalable, stackable green ammonia-producing units that are flexible enough to fit a wide array of customers from individual organizations, large marine ports, and distribution hubs. Further, AmmPower reports that it\u0026#39;s in the process of securing a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-location\"\u003eMichigan\u003c/span\u003e to develop optimal catalytic reactions that produce green ammonia.\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003eThe company that can figure out how to produce economical, carbon-free, and scalable ammonia may have three massive markets to sell to. That\u0026#39;s exactly what Ammpower is planning. It\u0026#39;s focused on a process that can break water down into hydrogen and oxygen and then add nitrogen from the atmosphere to create ammonia. It\u0026#39;s also committed to using carbon-free energy sources. \u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAmmPower\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e (\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AMMP.CN\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003eAMMP\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e; \u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003ca xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AMMPF\" rel=\"nofollow\"\u003e AMMPF\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e) \u003c/b\u003ewill aim to sell products it develops to these three huge markets: the fertilizer Industry, the fuel industry, and the transport sector. In less than 18 MONTHS from now, the company aims to deliver its first production units and ramp production to facility capacity. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eHydrogen may end up taking over heavy industries. Green ammonia may enable it to do that, and so much more. This could be far bigger than lithium. That means AmmPower is developing technology in a sector on the verge of a massive opportunity. The technology it\u0026#39;s developing uses ammonia to safely store and ship hydrogen. And over 120 ports around the world have already built or are in the process of building scalable ammonia handling facilities. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003eThe company is aiming to become a world leader in scalable proprietary production of Green Ammonia, and there couldn\u0026#39;t be a better time to harness the potential of this space. \u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eThe Hydrogen Boom Is Just Beginning\u003c/b\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eBallard Power Systems (BLPD) i\u003c/b\u003es a company that manufactures fuel cell systems. The company has been in operation for over 50 years and employs more than 1,000 people globally. Ballard\u0026#39;s most recent success was the rollout of their FCveloCity\u0026#x2122; product line which utilizes an advanced proton exchange membrane (PEM) technology to provide renewable energy solutions for commercial customers. \u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eBallard\u0026#39;s products are used in multiple industries including transportation, heavy-duty power generation, off-grid telecom towers, and emergency backup power at remote locations where grid connection is not possible or cost-prohibitive. With global demand for clean energy on the rise due to environmental concerns and government mandates, Ballard Power Systems projects continued growth\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eAmazon (AMZN)\u003c/b\u003e is investing big on the transportation of tomorrow too – leading a \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$700 million\u003c/span\u003e investment round in EV startup Rivian before acquiring robo-taxi startup Zoox for over \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$1 billion\u003c/span\u003e. It\u0026#39;s also carved out a major investment in an electric airplane startup, Beta, and a hydrogen-powered airline startup ZeroAvia. \u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003eAll of Amazon\u0026#39;s electric and hydrogen investments go hand-in-hand with its lofty renewable energy goals. From powering data centers with green energy to rethinking its entire supply chain, Amazon has proven that it is committed to going green in a big way. And it makes sense. It\u0026#39;s what investors want. And as we\u0026#39;ve seen with Amazon in the past, it truly values shareholder input. \u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003eAnother giant, \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eMicrosoft (MSFT)\u003c/b\u003e is also getting into the green energy game. Particularly with a big bet on hydrogen. The company is going all-in on research and development in this new industry, under the hypothesis that green hydrogen could completely change electrical systems that power data centers. And that could be huge news for the company\u0026#39;s thriving cloud-computing business. \u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eMark Monroe\u003c/span\u003e, the principal engineer at Microsoft\u0026#39;s Datacenter Advanced Development Group, explaining the company\u0026#39;s research into hydrogen fuel cells, noted, \u0026#34;Our goal was to scare our engineering group as little as possible by saying that this is just a drop-in diesel generator replacement, so we don\u0026#39;t have to change any of the electrical design.\u0026#34; \u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eApple (AAPL)\u003c/b\u003e has always been a green energy pioneer in the tech world. And that\u0026#39;s largely thanks to Ex-CEO \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003eSteve Jobs\u003c/span\u003e. He paved the way to a renewable future for the company and the industry as a whole.  From the products themselves to the packages they come in, and even the data centers powering them, Jobs went above and beyond to cut the environmental impact of his company.\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003eAnd now, the \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-money\"\u003e$2 trillion\u003c/span\u003e tech giant is looking into hydrogen, as well. Apple is already locking down patents and fueling new speculation left and right, from laptop applications to rumors of a partnership with Hyundai. One thing that remains clear, however, is its commitment to a greener tomorrow.\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003eApple isn\u0026#39;t the first to look into hydrogen fuel cells to solve power problems, however. \u003cb xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003eHewlett-Packard (HPQ) \u003c/b\u003eis a veteran in the game. Way back in 2017, it had already been hypothesizing and testing new and exciting ways to utilize hydrogen fuel cells to create carbon-free data centers in a way that wouldn\u0026#39;t disrupt current electrical grids. \u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003eIn a post on its website from 2018, the company wrote, \u0026#34;Hydrogen fuel cells lie at the heart of this strategy. These devices create energy through the electrochemical reaction between air and hydrogen. The electricity produced can be stored in batteries or used to drive an electric motor that powers a vehicle. Daimler and other automotive manufacturers, for example, have been successfully testing fuel cells in cars for many years.\u0026#34;\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003eBy. \u003cspan xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\" class=\"xn-person\"\u003ePaulie Jessop\u003c/span\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003cbr xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u003c/br\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"\u003e\u0026#x2A;\u0026#x2A;IMPORTANT!
